name: Icon of destruction
description: This is the endless fight, you and the rest of your brigade, fighting against the forces of hell. Yet you keep them at bay, for the well being of the inhabitants of this planet you call home, but you have a plan. One of the UAC bases was overrun. You are going a-wall and taking the base over, were you were previously stationed. Something in this research facility could possibly turn the tables on these bastards for good.
